item.title: Watch The Official Trailer For Shudder's New Horror-Thriller Dark Match [EXCLUSIVE]
item.description: Exclusive: ScreenRant presents the official trailer for new horror-thriller, Dark Match, which releases exclusively on Shudder Friday, January 31.

item.title: 10 Sequels That Beat Their Predecessors At The Box Office In 2024
item.description: From sci-fi epics to mind-bending body horrors, a number of the year's sequels soared past their predecessors to dominate the 2024 box office.

item.title: Marvel "Shouldn't Have Blocked" A Major Character From Appearing In Deadpool & Wolverine According To Deadpool Co-Creator
item.description: Deadpool co-creator Rob Liefeld has stated that a major character was blocked from being included in the story of 2024's Deadpool & Wolverine.
